form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to require additional information in State plans for Substance Use Prevention, Treatment, and Recovery Services block grants.

section.header: State plan requirements for substance use prevention, treatment, and recovery services block grants
section.text: Section 1932(b)(1)(A) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 300x–32(b)(1)(A)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in clause (ix), by striking and at the end;
in clause (x), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

subclause.text: the types of drugs available for the purpose of medication-assisted treatment within the State’s system of care;
the State’s medication-assisted treatment programs or protocols used for diversion and misuse prevention and enforcement;
the State’s data on any misuse of drugs used for medication-assisted treatment, including instances of medication-assisted treatment being mixed with other prescription drugs; and
the State’s data on any drug screening protocols within the State’s system of care, including any specific protocols for drug screening patients who receive medication-assisted treatment.
